Package edu.ucr.cs.pyneapple.utils.EMPUtils

Class SpatialGrid

java.lang.Object
edu.ucr.cs.pyneapple.utils.EMPUtils.SpatialGrid
public class SpatialGrid extends Object
The utility class for indexing the areas and computing the conguity relationship of the areas

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    SpatialGrid()
    The default constructor that initializes an empty spatial grid bounding box.
    SpatialGrid(double minx, double miny, double maxx, double maxy)
    The construction that initializes a bounding box that bounds the whole area set based on the coordinate of the four corners.

  • Constructor Details

    • SpatialGrid

      public SpatialGrid(double minx, double miny, double maxx, double maxy)
      The construction that initializes a bounding box that bounds the whole area set based on the coordinate of the four corners.
      Parameters:
      minx - The minimum x coordinate.
      miny - The minimum y coordinate.
      maxx - The maximum x coordinate.
      maxy - The maximum y coordinate.

    • SpatialGrid

      public SpatialGrid()
      The default constructor that initializes an empty spatial grid bounding box.

  • Method Details

    • calculateNeighbors

      public static HashMap<Integer,Set<Integer>> calculateNeighbors(ArrayList<org.locationtech.jts.geom.Geometry> polygons)
      Compute the set of neighbors for each area
      Parameters:
      polygons - The geometry polygons of each area
      Returns:
      A hash map with the id of the areas as the key and the set of their neighbor areas as the value.

    • getNeighbors

      Returns:
      the set of neighbor areas for the given area

      Parameters:
